resources.string: Now enabled, a couple of seconds needed for launcher to implement
Now disabled, a couple of seconds needed for launcher to implement

Do not try this feature if you are using an app launcher that has no app drawer(most of the Chinese phones)

If you accidentally find Boundo's launcher icon missing, please first uninstall then reinstall the app

If you enable this unit, please note that the Boundo WeChat icon(when sent to desktop) changes to Boundo icon after device restart, and the WeChat shortcut icon(when pinned on desktop) will be missing
